td.content: s:patient presents with moderate dyspepsia for more than 5 days. she is a white f physician assistant aged 33 yrs. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 57.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness, HEENT: WNL, all lung fields a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered Endoscopic therapy (Hemoclip) - stomach.
